CatDescriptText: Wilhemna Byrd Brown, wife of Judge Homer S. Brown and mother of Attorney Byrd Brown. She often gave out Byrd (Barr?)/Brown scholarships, named after her husband and Mayor Barr.
TitMainTitle: Man wearing Allegheny County American Legion cap, holding framed "The Pledge to the Flag" document and standing with Harriet Lewis and man in office with portrait photographs on wall
